text: Juan Antonio Giménez López (; 26 November 1943 – 2 April 2020) was an Argentine comic book artist. He was born in Mendoza, Argentina. His best known works were Heavy Metal and Métal hurlant. Giménez died on April 2, 2020 in Mendoza of COVID-19 at the age of 76.Veteran comic book artist Juan Giménez's death from coronavirus leaves industry members devastated ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Comics artists Category:People from Mendoza Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mendoza
